item.title: Reach 1 Million Deployments
item.author: contact@fnjoin.com (Salman Malik, Archie Cowan)
item.description: When will your team achieve 1M deployments in their environments? We do mean 10^6 deployments. 1M deployments may be difficult to believe if your team practices a monthly deployment or a quarterly deployment to your production environment. A team deploying to production every month will reach 10^6 deployments in a little over 83,333 years. A team deploying to production quarterly needs 250,000 years to reach 1M deployments. In November 2014, Dr.
